channel.description: Recent content in rp on hugonotes

item.title: Headless install of Arch Linux on Raspberry Pi Zero W
item.description: Prerequisites Arch Linux, with the following packages dosfstools wpa_supplicant Micro SD card USB stick with slot for Micro SD Card Raspberry Pi Zero W Create an Arch Linux ARM system TODO : chroot binfmt qemu Partition Micro SD Card In Linux, list the available devices: : sudo fdisk -l If Linux is running inside VirtualBox, consult the list of devices in: Devices>USB Insert the Micro SD card in the USB adapter, and insert the adapter in a USB port.
